column2: Form a National Football Team
The sport known as 'football' has gained a lot of popularity in $COUNTRY$, and there have been calls for us to create the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ National Football Team.
A great idea!
Should we be spending national resources on people kicking around a ball?
The First National Team in the World
The $COUNTRY_ADJ$ National Football Team has become the first national team of its kind in the world, and the model for all others.
Great news!
The Second National Team in the World
The $COUNTRY_ADJ$ National Football Team has become only the second national team of its kind in the world, and the model for many others.
Great news!
Challenge to International Match
The $COUNTRY_ADJ$ National Football Team is no longer the only national team in the world. We should organise the first international football match!
An excellent idea!
Challenge to International Match
$FROMCOUNTRY$ is challenging the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ National Football Team to the first international football match. Should we accept the challenge?
We will triumph!
We respectfully decline.
The First International Football Match

Huge crowds have gathered in $CAPITAL$, capital of $COUNTRY$, to watch the world's first international match of Association Football. The $COUNTRY_ADJ$ and $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ national teams faced-off in an intense game, with the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ team gaining the upper hand in the second half. Final score: $COUNTRY$ 3 - $FROMCOUNTRY$ 1.
Hooray!
The First International Football Match

Huge crowds have gathered in $CAPITAL$, capital of $COUNTRY$, to watch the world's first international match of Association Football. The $COUNTRY_ADJ$ and $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ national teams faced-off in an intense game, with the $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ team gaining the upper hand in the second half. Final score: $COUNTRY$ 1 - $FROMCOUNTRY$ 3.
Hooray!
Challenge Refused
$FROMCOUNTRY$ has refused our challenge for an international football match.
Cluck cluck cluck!
Establish FIFA

Association Football has become an extremely popular sport not only in $COUNTRY$, but also the world. The first international football match was a huge success with fans, and there is a big demand for an international body to organise a world cup. The proposed name of that organisation is the International Associated Football Federation, likely to be better-known by its French acronym, FIFA.
Let us establish FIFA!
Football is just a trend, it will fade into obscurity within the year.
Join FIFA

Association Football has become an extremely popular sport not only in $COUNTRY$, but also the world. The first international football match was a huge success with fans, and it created a big demand for an international body to organise a world cup. Thus was born the International Associated Football Federation, be better-known by its French acronym, FIFA. Should we join, for a chance at glory?
We will join!
Football is just a trend, it will fade into obscurity within the year.
Shall we host the first World Cup?
The International Associated Football Federation has approached us, proposing we organise the first World Cup. Should we accept?
We should take this opportunity.
No, we have better uses of our nation's limited resources.
Attend the first World Cup?

With the announcement of a host nation for the first ever World Cup, the International Associated Football Federation has extended participation invitations to its members. Shall we enter the playoffs?
May our team be blessed and highly favoured.
We unfortunately cannot attend.
The first World Cup

National football teams from around the world have gathered in $CAPITAL$, capital of $COUNTRY$ and host city of the first ever football World Cup, in order to compete for the highest honour in Association Football.
The World Cup is officially open!
World Cup Semifinalst
The $COUNTRY_ADJ$ National Football Team has done exceptionally well at the World Cup, securing a place at the final match.
May the odds be ever in our favour!
World Cup Final
The $COUNTRY_ADJ$ National Football Team has done exceptionally well at the World Cup, securing a place at the final match.
May the odds be ever in our favour!
